34.ara-name: كتاب الرؤيا عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Waki' bin 'Udus narrated from Abu Razin that the Prophet (s.a.w) said:" The Muslim's dreams are a portion of the forty-six portions of Prophet-hood. And it is (as if it is) on the leg of a bird, as long as it is not spoken of. But when it is spoken of it falls

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي تَعْبِيرِ الرُّؤْيَا
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Interpreting Dreams
